product_name: Sierra Designs Knuckle Hoodie Jacket - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Sierra Designs Knuckle Hoodie is a good companion to have along for the ride ... or the hike! It offers light wind protection to keep you comfortable while on the move. Ultra lightweight Kenosha(TM) polyester fabric is water- and wind-repellent, and breathable; a Durable Water Repellent finish helps shed moisture. Features a fitted hood and cuffs with elastic binding; cuff thumb holes hold sleeves in place. Internal draft flap. Sierra Designs Knuckle Hoodie has 2 zip hand pockets and 1chest pocket; stretch mesh pockets enhance ventilation. Closeout.
short_description: The Sierra Designs Knuckle Hoodie is a good companion to have along for the ride ... or the hike! It offers light wind protection to keep you comfortable while on the move.
